author: wsjcom
title: Fourteen Childhood Home Moves Taught Actor Joseph Fiennes to Adapt to His Audience
text:
Joseph Fiennes, 47, is an English film and television actor who stars in “The Handmaid’s Tale,” a streaming Hulu series that won eight Primetime Emmy Awards last year. The second season begins April 25. He spoke with Marc Myers.
My father was a colossal man. At 6-foot-3, he was a Moses figure with huge hands that could build a house and then give you a hug. To his seven children, he was the great protector—physically looming but always caring.
...
